title: Development Tools Schema
description: A schema to validate a FFXIV development tool for the XIV Resource Registry project.

author.description: The dev tool author's name which should match their author metadata filename.

description.description: A brief description of the Development Tool.

name.description: The name of the Development Tool.

short_name.description: The short name of the Development Tool.

source_url.description: The URL to the source code repository for the Development Tool.
